full_summary:
### W0501-23C038: RISO Forklifts Rentals
#### Solicitation Details
------------

| **Solicitation Number** | WS4015242374 |
|  ------------------  |  ------------  |
| **Reference Number**  |  WS4015242374-Doc4033045581 |
| **Title (English)**   | W0501-23C038 - RISO Forklifts Rentals       |
| **Title (French)**    | W0501-23C038 - OCIR Location Chariots élévateurs |
| **Publication Date**  |  2023-05-31   |
| **Closing Date**      |  2023-06-21T14:00:00  |

#### Tender Details
----------

This solicitation is part of a Request for Standing Offer for the rental of various forklifts to the Department of National Defence. The Technical Services Transportation Company at Gagetown, New Brunswick is the service site for these forklifts, and the rentals will be on an as-needed basis for a period of one year, with the option for two additional one-year extensions.

#### Category and Classification
---------------------------

The procurement category for this solicitation is Service and supplies (SRV), with a classification under Subcategory 24101603, Forklifts. The services are required for transportation purposes.

#### Address and Contracting Entity Details
--------------------------------------

**Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**  
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage  
Gatineau, Quebec  
K1A 0S5 Canada

**Department of National Defence (DND)**  
101 Colonel By Dr,  
Ottawa, Ontario,  
K1A 0K2 Canada

#### Trade Agreements and WT/O GPA
---------------------------

The Standing Offer Request is open to bidders from countries that have a free trade agreement (FTA) with Canada. The countries eligible under this solicitation include Canada, South Korea, Colombia, Panama, the European Union, Ukraine, Honduras, Chile, the UK, the U.S. and other participating countries.

#### Contact Information
----------------------

Contact Kristelle LeBlanc, SC Sessional, at  [kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristelle.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) for further details.
